content.query:
-- Re-create the external table with all columns as NVARCHAR
-- Drop the external table if it already exists
IF OBJECT_ID('dbo.QBiLiveClientManager', 'U') IS NOT NULL
  DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.QBiLiveClientManager;


-- Re-create the external table with all columns as NVARCHAR
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.QBiLiveClientManager (
    [CLIENT NAME] NVARCHAR(255),
    [QBi LIVE SCORE] NVARCHAR(255),
    [AGENT NAME] NVARCHAR(255),
    [APPLICATION DATE] NVARCHAR(255),
    [TOTAL PREMIUMS] NVARCHAR(255),
    [TOTAL FACE AMOUNT] NVARCHAR(255),
    [75% ADVANCE COMMISSION] NVARCHAR(255),
    [17-MONTH QBI PROTECTION DATE] NVARCHAR(255),
    [FNA & PROPOSALS] NVARCHAR(255),
    [QBI FORM] NVARCHAR(255),
    [CREATE CLIENT PORTAL] NVARCHAR(255),
    [UNDERWRITING CALL SET] NVARCHAR(255),
    [SUPPORT TEXT] NVARCHAR(255),
    [INVESTMENT APPTS. SCHEDULED] NVARCHAR(255),
    [BUY TERM INVEST DIFFERENCE] NVARCHAR(255),
    [SOLD 1 NL PRODUCT] NVARCHAR(255),
    [THANK YOU CALL/ CARD] NVARCHAR(255),
    [ISSUED] NVARCHAR(255),
    [PLACED] NVARCHAR(255),
    [PLPP] NVARCHAR(255),
    [AUTO / HOME] NVARCHAR(255),
    [VIVINT] NVARCHAR(255),
    [SR. HEALTH] NVARCHAR(255),
    [SPLIT-SALE?] NVARCHAR(255),
    [IF YES: SPLIT AGENT NAME] NVARCHAR(255),
    [RECRUITED OFF SHORTFALL] NVARCHAR(255),
    [COLLECTED BENEFICIARY #1] NVARCHAR(255),
    [COLLECTED BENEFICIARY #2] NVARCHAR(255),
    [COLLECTED BENEFICIARY #3] NVARCHAR(255),
    [COLLECTED BENEFICIARY #4] NVARCHAR(255),
    [4-FOR-SURE EFFICIENCY %] NVARCHAR(255),
    [4-FOR-SURE GRADE] NVARCHAR(255),
    [POLICY STATUS] NVARCHAR(255)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/fadata/processed/staging_qbi_live_client_manager/qbi_live_client_manager.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = MyAdlsGen2DataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = CsvFormatAgents
);
